sentences.en: As he was getting buoy , however, he dropped the wet rope.
sentences.cn: 然而,当他尽量靠近浮标的时候, 他把湿绳弄掉了.

sentences.en: Buoy observation and cross - sectional survey abilities have been improved as a whole.
sentences.cn: 海上浮标观测能力和 断面 调查能力进入整体提升阶段.

sentences.en: He saw the buoy floating above the Inchcape Rock.
sentences.cn: 他看到印奇角礁石上那浮动的浮标.

sentences.en: I relaxed, letting the salt water buoy me up.
sentences.cn: 我放松下来, 任凭海水托浮着.

sentences.en: Life is like a buoy, nothing can make It'sunk.
sentences.cn: 人生犹如一支浮标, 任何风浪也无法使它沉没.

sentences.en: Really, he owed his life to the rubber buoy.
sentences.cn: 确实,多亏了那只橡皮救生圈, 他才保住性命.

sentences.en: Take a life buoy with you when you go swimming.
sentences.cn: 下午去游泳的时候把救生圈带上.

sentences.en: The buoy floated back and forth in the shallow water.
sentences.cn: 这个浮标在浅水里漂来漂去.

sentences.en: The cut in bank rate is expected to buoy up the economy.
sentences.cn: 银行利率的降低可望振兴经济.

sentences.en: The party is buoyed up by the latest opinion poll results.
sentences.cn: 该党因为最近一次民意测验的结果而受到鼓舞。

sentences.en: The underlying assets of the company is particularly interesting in the buoy.
sentences.cn: 此次标的资产中的中航标公司尤为引人注意.

sentences.en: The whole buoy was embossed with barnacles ( Herman Melville )
sentences.cn: 整个戈凸饰有鼻钳子 ( 赫尔曼梅尔维尔 )

sentences.en: Then take away your hand suddenly, what happens to the life buoy?
sentences.cn: 然后突然松开你的手, 救生圈会发生什么变化?

sentences.en: Twelfth: Life buoy . Feel free to come when you need to talk.
sentences.cn: 第十二件: 救生圈(救生圈形的糖果)当你需要谈一谈时,随时可以来.

sentences.en: We wear the life buoy and play with the dolphins.
sentences.cn: 戴上救生圈跟海豚一起玩.

sentences.en: What happened to the speed boat after It'struck a buoy?
sentences.cn: 快艇撞上了浮标之后,发生了什么?

trans.tran_en: an object that floats on the sea, a lake etc to mark a safe or dangerous area
